title: NgRx State Options Schema
description: Creates state related files (reducer, state, actions, selectors) in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the state?

path.description: The path at which to create the service, relative to the workspace root.

flat.description: When true (the default), creates files at the top level of the project.

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new service.

addEffects.description: When true also create file to add Effects.
